title: Ticket #3895: Expand Windows testing with recent new tests
description:
Upon testing a list of new tests and forcing these to run on windows, the following seem solid and are being added to nightly test by adding them to Windows_list. 

  negotiator_match_log_exists
  cmd_condor_submit_dashspool
  job_concurrency_limits
  job_schedd_restart-check_reconnect
  job_local_resources
  job_check_exitcode_in_classad
  job_services_during_neg_cycle
  basic_startd_slot_attrs
  job_basic_start_test
check_ins: 2013-Sep-05 15:37   Check-in [37482]: These test seem also reliable for windows #3895 (By Bill Taylor )
creator: bt
